thread.title: New Ring Brands 'Married' On Your Finger So You Can't Cheat
thread.title_full: New Ring Brands 'Married' On Your Finger So You Can't Cheat

author: Joel Balsam
title: New Ring Brands 'Married' On Your Finger So You Can't Cheat
text:
Wedding Ring Stops Cheaters By Imprinting Married On Your Finger © Hybrid Images / Getty Images Wedding Ring Stops Cheaters By Imprinting Married On Your Finger Trending News: New Ring Brands 'Married' On Your Finger So You Can't Cheat Answer Now > Long Story Short 
Bespoke jeweler Jason of Beverly Hills has come up with an anti-cheating wedding ring that temporarily brands "married" on your finger (if you wear men's rings). Long Story 
Are you one of the guys who is married, but takes off your wedding ring when you go out to meet the ladies. No judgment here — I'll leave that to the Today Show's Katie Couric. 
"Nothing is creepier than a guy who takes off his wedding ring," said Couric on Thursday's program . 
The morning chatterboxes had a quick chat about a new black diamond-encrusted black gold ring developed by Jason of Beverly Hills. I can't tell you how much it costs, because I 100% don't have enough moolah to "request a quote," but I'm positive I can't afford one. 
Nor, would I want one. The special feature of the ring is that it is embossed with 'deirram' on the inside. So when the wearer takes it off, they've got "married" printed right there for all their potential mistresses to see. jasonofbh.com
